links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

messages.body: $AAPL An anonymous source says Apple Music has surpassed Spotify in terms of U.S. subscribers. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-did-apple-inc-aapl-music-just-pass-spotify/

links.title: Did Apple Inc. (AAPL) Music Just Pass Spotify?
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has long played second fiddle to music streaming giant Spotify, but the tide appears to have turned (in the U.S. anyway). As MacRumors reports, Apple's own music subscription service has allegedly eclipsed Spotify in Apple's home market: Apple Music has now surpassed Spotify's subscriber count in the United States, according to an industry source who spoke to Digital Music News.
